body_html:
@ezyang right now mkldnn is triggered by conda channel for pytorch, similar way to cudnn, as long as mkldnn is found in conda, pytorch will be compiled against it. So this PR is not related to recent discussion on "static build mkldnn" kind of staff.

Do you have CI with mkldnn pre installed now? I recalled that you enabled this after PR6062

Besides, even mkldnn is not found in conda (thus not enabled), pytorch should able to be built without any problem. could you please point out where the failed CI comes from?
